product.longDescription: Medium-size plants with good leaf cover produce high yields of blocky, 4 oz. plum tomatoes. Fruits have a deep red color with good flavor. Good disease resistance package. High resistance to Fusarium wilt races 1 and 2, late blight, tomato spotted wilt virus, and Verticillium wilt; and intermediate resistance to early blight. Determinate. Avg. 12,900 seeds/oz. Packet: 15 seeds.

attributes.label: Grid Description
value: A productive plum tomato with late blight resistance.
